author: gumb00
content:
I think it's fine

in evmone utilities we have 0th section type non-configurable (so no way to construct invalid type), and other sections require explicit type declaration (so no default)

content: That would be awesome.  The only time we wouldn't set it to non-returning is for second and subsequent code sections, which is the exception.
